reasoning.keyword_integration: Prioritized highest-volume roots: included 'gym equipment', 'home gym equipment', 'fitness equipment', 'workout equipment', and 'strength training' as readable phrases. Used 'cable machine handle attachment' early to match category relevance while keeping brand and material upfront. Wove in material and finish terms (steel, matte black, powder coated, rubber grip, universal carabiner) as natural feature descriptors so every segment serves both descriptive and SEO roles without keyword stuffing.
